Tesla to kick off Cybertruck's China tour in late Jan -mediaA China-wide tour showcasing Tesla's flagship Cybertruck pickup will kick off in late January, with eight trucks simultaneously on display in eight cities including Shanghai and the capital, Beijing, media outlet the Paper said on Tuesday. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 03:40:11 GMT TMDM27RPZVJA7E56ZE5UPYITEQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-kick-off-cybertrucks-china-tour-late-jan-media-2024-01-23/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China regulator removes draft video game rules from website; shares jumpChina's gaming regulator has removed from its website rules it proposed last month aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage playing video games, checks by Reuters on Tuesday showed, in a move that boosted gaming company shares. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 03:15:38 GMT FNB24GZMTFNGBD35FZHSMYJZAA https://www.reuters.com/technology/china-regulator-removes-draft-video-game-rules-website-shares-jump-2024-01-23/Josh Ye技术
Death toll in China landslide rises to 11, rescuers still search for missingThe death toll from a landslide in China's Yunnan province rose to 11 on Tuesday as rescue workers battled freezing temperatures and snow to locate dozens of missing people. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 03:01:20 GMT SRNGIIFIBFNZRML6CY4HHORTYA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/death-toll-china-landslide-rises-11-rescuers-still-search-missing-2024-01-23/Reuters世界中国
China weighs stock market rescue package backed by $278 bln - Bloomberg NewsChinese authorities are considering a package of measures to stabilise a slumping stock market, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 02:53:42 GMT DXK4MSBEL5LS3GF62MU7YFGM5A https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-weighs-stock-market-rescue-package-backed-by-278-bln-bloomberg-news-2024-01-23/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Oil steadies on mixed supply cues, cautious outlook on ChinaOil prices were little changed on Tuesday as traders weighed a host of conflicting supply and demand worries, with rising tensions in the Middle East and cold weather woes disrupting production in the United States. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 02:07:58 GMT GRTFR6BEYFI55KDD45ZRVY2NOE https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/oil-slips-economic-concerns-eclipse-geopolitical-tensions-2024-01-23/Emily Chow, Trixie Yap市场商品
South Korea's economy likely grew at slightly slower pace in Q4 - Reuters pollSouth Korea's economy expanded at a slightly slower pace in the final three months of 2023 compared to Q3 as elevated interest rates held back domestic demand despite higher exports, according to economists polled by Reuters. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 01:55:08 GMT RTP6TX2UZZP3NLHVIZZM6DXVEI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/south-koreas-economy-likely-grew-slightly-slower-pace-q4-2024-01-23/Veronica Khongwir市场宏观问题
